message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $75 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position. While I value the product at $80, I'm willing to come down to $85 to make this deal work.  It's a fair price considering its worth. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $80 for the product. This is my final offer.
